website_summaries.verdict: For buyers hunting for a retro tennis style footwear, the Coast Star from Adidas Originals is a practical pair to consider.This model bears the classic touches from Adidas and inserted with sleek details for modern comfort. With countless of hues to choose from and a price range that is within the budget-friendly range, this shoe is worth adding to one's collection.
pros: A significant number of buyers have shared that they found the Adidas Coast Star very comfortable
Some have mentioned that this sneaker is a practical alternative to other pricier all-around sneakers found in the market
The stylish and timeless look of this shoe are applauded several times in the review section
A handful of satisfied buyers like the first-rate quality materials utilized in this Adidas footwear
Buyers can purchase the Coast Star sneaker at an affordable price range
Many buyers have adored that this pair from Adidas is easy to clean
Most of the reviewers have highly recommended this shoe to everyone
A few wearers have enjoyed the lightness of this kick
cons: A few critics have complained that they found the Adidas Coast Star a bit larger as compared to their usual fit
A couple of users have griped that they do not like the squeaky sound this pair creates while walking in it

customer_reviews.title: knockoffs
customer_reviews.text: Look almost too good for 100% leather - because they are not. One giveaway is the synthetic material used for the tongue. Also, right and left serial numbers match, Genuine Addidas have different serial numbers for right and left. So sad, thought I was getting a great deal, back they go. Shame, shame, for selling counterfeits!
customer_reviews.author: mugshot

customer_reviews.title: Very confusing
customer_reviews.text: The seller has been playing with the descriptions of the shoes. First the title said "kids" shoes, now it becomes "men's". Anyhow the shoes only deserve 3 stars at most because the sizes are not right for either men's or kids. They are too long for their sizes even for men. The shapes of the shoes are not right too. The front toe areas are too small/narrow. The workmanship is not good either, compared with my other Adidas sneakers. I bought two pairs of different colors for about $30 in total. But I am not sure they would be comfortable to wear and walk for some distance. I am deciding whether to return both, or just one pair.
customer_reviews.author: S-N-D

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Fluke
customer_reviews.text: 0 stars rating.They were a mens sz 8 which is supposed to fit a woman whis sz 9.5 but they were huge. Like an 10.5 in men definitely not an 8 in men sz. AND they are not leather. Not real Adidas. Look good though they're fakes . Then when I called amazon it was a nightmare. Somethings wrong at amazon
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.  Check size chart.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for under twenty-six dollars! So, you should obviously check brand websites for their size charts before purchasing online, and if you do, you’ll see that Adidas runs a half a size smaller than some other brands. If you measure, you’ll be all set. My husband said these are comfortable, and they look good, so we’re pleased. :).
customer_reviews.author: SCJC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: First impression- the show looks amazing, feels amazing to wear and exactly matches my expectations. Is comfortable to wear as well. They are adult size of course as it mention men’s (Not kids)in the title. I will post an update after couple of months of use to give my feedback about long term use. But first impressions are definitely five star 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Yogi

customer_reviews.title: Not kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 year old. I thought these were a kids size 13 and they sent a men’s size 13, obviously I had to return them. I’m pretty sure they are fake adidas, looked ok but a little on the cheap side.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Adidas!!! Old school sneakers, um yes please
customer_reviews.text: Been quite awhile since I have bought a pair of adidas sneakers bought these for my boyfriend. He seems to like them, but I instantly noticed the sneaker feels uh lighter then the old school adidas sneakers I remember from the old days at the price I paid hoping they aren’t going to fall apart fast material wise white part seems flaky. But, can’t tell till it actually happens. These are what he wanted so they are what he got. Arrived super fast kinda I don’t have prime took 5 days to get here.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie_105

customer_reviews.title: Not kids sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my 4 year old and they’re a men’s 11. Not kids.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie Balmer

customer_reviews.title: SQUEAKY SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes, except for one very important thing. EVERY STEP I TAKE IN THESE SHOES SQUEAK LIKE NO OTHER!!! Every single step. Squeak, Squeak, Squeak. I called Adidas Support Line on 7/2/20 and they told me that they can't do anything about it. They said, it is not a manufacturing defect. I told them that they are correct. It's not a manufacturing defect.....IT IS A DESIGN DEFECT, which is even worse. They still told me that they can't do anything about it....If I could attach an audio file to this review, I would so that everyone could hear my squeaky Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: jdc

customer_reviews.title: TWICE!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes expecting to get what the description says, "Women's Coast Star Shoes Size 7 1/2". NOPE. They are clearly are NOT womens size. Like the "size 12 boys" pair I also purchased, they were WAY too big. One pair advertised as "boys" and the other as "women's", BOTH pair clearly MENS shoes. VERY disappointing to say the least. This will be my first return/refund and am hoping it's relatively painless.
customer_reviews.author: fini Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: This was not "kids"
customer_reviews.text: Returned. I ordered little kids....they sent adults. Does not appear to be real leather as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Dr B.

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have the same size and model of this shoe and still I don’t even use of this shoe too big and uncomfortable I want to return it but I was not around and the day of returning is over so I don’t know what to do for. It now if you will give me a chance to return it would be great for me and order a new shoe
customer_reviews.author: Mk3 Cool J

customer_reviews.title: Says women’s, but the shoe you get will be men’s
customer_reviews.text: The listing for this shoe is for a women’s shoe. When it was shipped, the order information was for a men’s shoe. When I clicked on the links within the actual order confirmation the gender wasn’t even consistent. Also, the quality of this shoe is horrible. I agree with everyone else in saying this can’t be a legitimate Adidas product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: The shoes say kids shoes and they are adult shoes. The most disappointing thing was when I contacted customer service they said they would replace the shoes and told me I would receive a kids size. I told them they couldn’t be bigger then 7 inches and they assured me they would be correct
customer_reviews.author: Sammy F. Loo

customer_reviews.title: Standard Skater Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked this style of shoe, but one thing I like about the Adidas Coast Stars is they tend to run even a little bit wider than others. For skating shoes, this is pretty common, but as someone with wide feet, these tend to fit better than others for me. This is my 3rd pair and I will continue to purchase as long as they keep making them!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca selock

customer_reviews.title: Adult size
customer_reviews.text: Not kids size as indicated in the title. But it is actually too long even for adult, and the toe area is small and narrow, making the shoes look ugly. The workmanship is not good either. But at $13 and some change, I decide to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: S-N-D

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: He loved them! These are a fantastic price for the quality! Awesome buy! Happy to have found them! People were having trouble deciding on buying them because they were listed as kid sizing at one point... However, I can confirm that they are for men pertaining to size 👍
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky
customer_reviews.text: These are the nosiest, squeakiest shoes I have ever owned. I thought the noise would go away after I broke them in. It’s been months, and they still squeak. I COATED them in baby powder. Here’s the thing, these shoes don’t squeak when they are just saturated in baby powder, yet they look absolutely atrocious. I’m a nurse and prefer comfortable, no-frills shoes. Patients and co-workers could hear me long before I approached them because these shoes are so embarrassingly squeaky. Try sneaking around in a patient’s room at night with these on. Doesn’t work out so well.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Sisk

customer_reviews.title: Narrow Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Many people have noted correctly that these shoes run large. They also run narrow. In addition, the seams in the construction of the shoe push against the toes. They look good but these shoes are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes twice for about 6 hours. The shoes FOLD IN while walking and the material is very thin and cheap. There is NO WAY these shoes are real. Real adidas are usually comfortable. These feel like walking in gladiator sandals. Purchase your shoes at Finish Line to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: NoPantiesOn

customer_reviews.title: adidas Men's Coast Star Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Size: 11 Color: White/Black/White The sneakers fit as expected! I love that I purchased $12.37 for these shoes. Though I wish you can put a good price on the Black/Black/Grey size 11 too! But these shoes are Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Carter Thiero

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe..Great Price
customer_reviews.text: After reading the mixed reviews I was hesitant to order these but for the price I took a chance. They are true to size in my opinion my son wears a 7.5 and these fit him well. The quality is great too. Overall he is happy and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf3J's

customer_reviews.title: Not Designed for Wide Feet
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a half size up and they still fit poorly. I have wide feet and there's no way they will fit...run very narrow! They look gr8 but alas will never work for me!
customer_reviews.author: Erik V.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome in every way
customer_reviews.text: I like the low profile. The comfort is amazing! The leather in these Adidas shoes wrap my feet in mellow comfort. Did I mention they’re simply awesome in every way?!
customer_reviews.author: Cyclops51

customer_reviews.title: C-
customer_reviews.text: Ad originally said kids size was purchased as a 2 kids and was so big it didnt fit my husband. I was refunded pretty fast but it was very disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tara S Halpern

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for adults
customer_reviews.text: The shoe quality was great, the price was very reasonable. They are for adults not for children. I was looking for Adidas size 13 for my 4 year old son and came across this pair but after reading the reviews it said they were men's size. My husband is size 13 in adults so I went ahead and bought them anyway because they were under $20.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great basic Adidas Sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I was particularly happy they were available in size 13.5. My foot has odd dimensions and this works out just perfectly with plenty of room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Deezy Weezy

customer_reviews.title: Ripoffs/fakes guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: Trust the reviews, they are completely fake. They look more like a size 18 than a size 12 and 1/2. And then I called and talked to the supervisor at Amazon, and he wanted to act like it wasn't his problem because a third-party sold it. Some place in Brooklyn New York is who sells these and they are ripping everybody off. Also the material is not leather and the shoes squeak really loud. Another rip-off by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how cheap these were going in. I needed a new pair of beater shoes to wear out and tear up at long nights at the bar. Overall i am pleasantly surprised with how these came. They are premium leather and are decently comfy, They aren't very flashy by any means but for a nice reliable pair of black shoes to wear out, they get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great deal great fit
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes I had actually bought them for myself I never got to wear them he took them over and refuses to give them back they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Graley

customer_reviews.title: Full Leather Conforms to Feet
customer_reviews.text: Very good price for high quality basic walking or house shoe. RIdes low, I would not recommend these for sports activities.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Gil

customer_reviews.title: Did I just step on a mouse?
customer_reviews.text: These shoes squeak so bad. It's the tongue. I've tried lightly sanding baby powder everything only stops it temporarily. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: NOT KIDS
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the reviews BEFORE buying them. Because the description says "kids size 12", I thought I'd be getting a kid size shoe. So NOT the case. They are enormous mens size 12. I didn't even bother checking the material or anything else because they were obviously WAY too big for my 5 year old. This will be my first return/refund and I'm really hoping it's not a huge pain in the ass.
customer_reviews.author: fini Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: this a gift for my son and he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Unzaga

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: My husband looks great in these and he finds them quite comfortable. Versatile shoe that cane be worn just about anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Desireé P

customer_reviews.title: Super White
customer_reviews.text: Actually men's sizes. Run a bit large. Great deal for about 20 bucks. For casual use I would say.

customer_reviews.title: didn't fit tooooo large
customer_reviews.text: really long - not what i have been buying over the years - too bad may have to go to famous footwear

customer_reviews.title: Ice Creams
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and super duper white. They squeak a lot on hard floors when you first wear them. Love Adidas Originals

customer_reviews.title: Classic Adidas
customer_reviews.text: Classic Adidas look. Very comfortable and stylish. Great addition to any daily wardrobe.

customer_reviews.text: These are misleading and not a kid size at all. Please read carefully and don’t be fooled with the title stating kid size!

customer_reviews.text: The shoes I ordered came in a size 13 in MENS...

customer_reviews.title: Classic Adidas
customer_reviews.text: I like the classic look and feel of this shoe. I would recommend theses shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pair is an entire Inch more narrow than my Adidas also white but with black stripes. Same sole, same shoe, very bizarre. Also so narrow the sole started coming unstitched after two days of wear

customer_reviews.title: Cute cute cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. I didn’t want to hop on the bandwagon of the chunky white sneaker. This is a nice in between, very cute with skirts and dresses

customer_reviews.title: Too large but my mistake
customer_reviews.text: Too large but my mistake i ordered a 0.5 bigger size for myself, looks very nice

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: It was too big for size 13 and honestly looked fake as well

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Solid shoe for weightlifting. Needed flats to train in and for the price the size I needed was about $20 it’s a great value. The shoe does not seem breathable and probably will smell after long. But compared to what weight lifting shoes generally cost this has a solid bases and can fit the purpose well.

customer_reviews.title: Did not like it too much
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable i wanted to return it but i lost the box

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. Sounds like I’m walking in snow. My fault for buying 16.00 shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size received...
customer_reviews.text: Item CLEARLY said kids Size 10.5. Yet... I received a grown Adult sized pair of shoes. Probably not even authentic..i should've known better.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought theses and loves them , will buy again when needed

customer_reviews.title: noisy shoes
customer_reviews.text: the shoes are big and they make a sqeaking noise when I walk. I have not decided if I am going to return them.

customer_reviews.title: Yes buy these
customer_reviews.text: They are so clean and nice. The price was unbeatable. I would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Look good but not leather as advertised. One giveaway is the synthetic material used for the tongue. Fit is not typical for quality shoes. So sad, thought I was getting what was represented as an Amazon Choice product but got cheap knock off crap instead. Shame, shame, for selling counterfeits!
customer_reviews.author: J. Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love ❤️ I recommended get size down I’m normally 6 and I got a 4.4 f perfect 👌

customer_reviews.title: Cheap buy so expect a low end product but still good for how cheap it was
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap good buy for 24$. And only thing is from the top angle looking down at shoes they don't look that great but from every other angle the shoes look very nice..almost like a magic trick . But either way for how cheap it was , it was a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: May not arrive in original shoe box. /:
customer_reviews.text: Recieved in an Amazon shipping box but no original shoe box. Kind of disappointed because these were supposed to be a gift.

customer_reviews.title: its great
customer_reviews.text: i love it its better then i thought it be

customer_reviews.text: Lower end of the adidas product line but overall still a decent shoe for the price!!

customer_reviews.title: These are for adults not kids
customer_reviews.text: These are for adults not kids like the product says.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this shoes
customer_reviews.text: i'm very happy i purchased this Adidas for Myself, They are well made, comfortable and look nice, They are for Men, i got a Men size 14 for only $22 ,You can't go wrong :-)

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: No padding especially if you have flat feet but good shoes

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow, but is fine.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this when it was on sale on amazon. For the price it was worth it, but these shoes run narrow. So if you have wider feet, just stick with the regular Adidas court shoes that look similar to these.

customer_reviews.title: Not kids shoes
customer_reviews.text: Like the other review said, received adult shoes. Not the kids as listed in the description.

customer_reviews.title: too big but cute
customer_reviews.text: not sure if these shoes run big or not but I bought my sons true size and these shoes were way too big.

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky
customer_reviews.text: Theses shoes are comfortable, fit as expected, and are a good value for the money but they Squeak. They will not stop squeaking no matter how much I wear them. Is there any way to get rid of the squeak?

customer_reviews.title: Super and normal size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for women, 8 size super for 9,5 women size.
customer_reviews.author: Nataly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing find
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I bought a pair for my son and a pair for myself. I couldn't be happier and ice bragged so much about the low cost. My friends and family are now coming to this site to do this shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Russell

customer_reviews.title: For show, not on the go
customer_reviews.text: I wear 13 but i can fit a 12, but i got these in 12 and the right foot kinda hurts after wearing them around. But they look even cooler in person. Really cool. Not practical.

customer_reviews.title: Men’s shoe not children
customer_reviews.text: These are men size 13 not children I am unable to return and now have a size 13 shoe I don’t need.

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are NOT real adidas. They are counterfeit. Horrible quality and they squeak when you walk in them.

customer_reviews.title: Order exact size!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought half size larger than needed and it ended up being a full size too big. Nice shoe but fit is weird.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sorg

customer_reviews.title: Poor materials
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to believe these aren't counterfeit. Leather is thin, stiff and soles are already cracking. More of a flip flop than a shoe
customer_reviews.author: C W Christophe

customer_reviews.title: Wow WoW Wow
customer_reviews.text: I love them. There fit perfect. The delivery was fast. I will order more. It is hard to find my size and I am very grateful.

customer_reviews.title: i didnt know Adidas could ever manufacture such cheap stuff
customer_reviews.text: didnt try it, its the worst Adidas product ive ever seen, walmart has better tennis shoes under 15 bucks. I returned them

customer_reviews.title: These sneakers are fake!!!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are fake! I did not expect to get a terrible fake. This is not skin, it is a poor quality skin substitute. Sneakers have a very unpleasant, terrible smell. The worst product I bought
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe! Not sure why the bad rating. A tad big but not bad. Feels and looks great.

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: The fit and the price was right, tooooo cute on my feet
customer_reviews.author: Matasha S.

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were pretty comfortable but were squeaky. It was a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was late
customer_reviews.text: The sneaker is great and it’s exactly what shown on the picture, but the delivery was rescheduled two times and was late by about two weeks.

customer_reviews.title: Not children’s size
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look great but it was a men’s size not kids as described. Had to send back my son was bummed out.

customer_reviews.title: Giant shoe
customer_reviews.text: This says kids but it was clearly an adult size. I was shocked when I saw this giant size 13 shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Carylee M.

customer_reviews.title: Kids 13 vs. Man 13
customer_reviews.text: I had placed an order for kids size 13 and received a mans size 13.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: They're definitely not fake and they're definitely not kids I ordered size 10 fits perfect

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Low quality shoe Not durable material shoe was only $20 what would you expect I bought them for an 80’s themed party so it worked for that night

customer_reviews.title: Catfished
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size men 11 1/2. The shoe is shaped oddly and it's 2 inches too big. I question the authenticity. Also, the leather looks worn. I'm returning this item.

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: no need to break these sneakers in they are extremely comfortable right out of the gate

customer_reviews.title: True to size

customer_reviews.text: Received a pair of adult adidas sneakers while ordering a Kids shoes, was very disappointed.

product_meta.title: adidas Originals Men's Coast Star Sneaker
product_meta.description: A clean and crisp tennis style that's meant for everyday wear. These men's low-profile shoes offer a timeless look in smooth leather with serrated 3-Stripes and a simple rubber cupsole. They show off authentic adidas Originals style with a Trefoil logo on the tongue and heel patch.
feature_bullets: Shoes run’s large. Suggested to buy a size down
Low top leather shoes that serve up classic style
